column4: anyone know how to change the resolution of the virtual terminals?
because the open source drivers are better that way, they use "kernel mode setting"
if you really care (and it's not super easy) google around for "framebuffer" "VT" "resolution"
ok thanks, i tried googling stuff but i was getting no where, now that I have some key words it should help. thanks
i got the resolution changed on the virtual terminals. thanks you so much for the help
can you give me a link? Id like to do it too :D
it was the link you provided
install hwinfo and run sudo hwinfo --framebuffer
to do it permanently I think you can edit /etc/default/grub and then run update-grub as root
